mapper.select: SELECT NAME , ID , PWD , PHONE , GYM_ID FROM user WHERE ID = #{USER_ID, jdbcType=CHAR}
SELECT ID , NAME FROM gym WHERE ID = (select GYM_ID from user where id = #{USER_ID, jdbcType=CHAR})
SELECT ID , NAME , PRICE , `EXPLAIN` , EVENT , MAIN_IMAGE , -1 AS MY_AMOUNT , AMOUNT , (select UNIT_DATA from product_unit where UNIT = UNIT_ID ) as UNIT , DISCOUNT FROM product WHERE EVENT = 1

SELECT ID , NAME , PRICE , `EXPLAIN` , EVENT , MAIN_IMAGE , MY_AMOUNT , AMOUNT , (select UNIT_DATA from product_unit where UNIT = UNIT_ID ) as UNIT , DISCOUNT FROM product p, user_pocket up where up.USER_ID = #{USER_ID, jdbcType=CHAR} and up.PRODUCT_ID = p.ID

SELECT ID , NAME , PRICE , `EXPLAIN` , EVENT , MAIN_IMAGE , -1 AS MY_AMOUNT , AMOUNT , (select UNIT_DATA from product_unit where UNIT = UNIT_ID ) as UNIT , DISCOUNT FROM product p, user_cart uc where uc.USER_ID = #{USER_ID, jdbcType=CHAR} and uc.PRODUCT_ID = p.ID;
SELECT ch.`TIME` , ch.GYM_ID , ch.USER_ID , u.NAME , ch.MESSAGE FROM chatting ch, user u where ch.GYM_ID = #{GYM_ID, jdbcType=INTEGER} and ch.USER_ID = u.ID order by `TIME` desc limit 20

SELECT t2.NUTRITION_NAME , t2.NUTRITION_FUNCTION , t2.NUTRITION_INTAKE , t2.NUTRITION_SIDE_EFFECT , t2.NUTRITION_PRECAUTION , t2.NUTRITION_TIMING , t2.NUTRITION_SUMMARY , t1.MENTION FROM NUTRITION_INFO t2 INNER JOIN LEVEL_RECOMMEND_NUTRITION t1 ON t1.NUTRITION_NAME = t2.NUTRITION_NAME WHERE t1.LVL <= #{LEVEL, jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT t2.NUTRITION_NAME , t2.NUTRITION_FUNCTION , t2.NUTRITION_INTAKE , t2.NUTRITION_SIDE_EFFECT , t2.NUTRITION_PRECAUTION , t2.NUTRITION_TIMING , t2.NUTRITION_SUMMARY FROM NUTRITION_INFO t2 WHERE NUTRITION_NAME IN (SELECT NUTRITION FROM EXERCISE_PURPOSE_NUTRITION_REL WHERE PURPOSE = #{PURPOSE})

SELECT t2.NAME , t2.URL , t2.IMG_URL , t2.BRAND , t2.PRICE , t2.SALE_PRICE , t2.DISCOUNT , t2.CATEGORY , t2.KEYWORD , t2.RATING , t2.REVIEW , t2.IS_ROCKET_DELIVERY , t2.IS_ROCKET_FRESH FROM SHOP_PRODUCT t2 INNER JOIN RECOMMEND_FOOD t1 ON t1.PRODUCT_ID = t2.PRODUCT_ID WHERE t1.NUTRIENT_TYPE = #{NUTRIENT_TYPE} and DIET_TYPE = #{DIET_TYPE}
